reason: Strong fundamental catalysts from institutional adoption (Dubai's tokenization plan, improved DeFi security) and Bitcoin's resilience against macro headwinds are driving positive sentiment and price action. However, the unknown implications of the SEC's quiet shift on stablecoin holdings introduce regulatory uncertainty that necessitates caution and careful monitoring of market reactions.
headlines: SEC makes quiet shift to brokers' stablecoin holdings that may pack big results
Bitcoin shrugs off Trump's new tariffs, nears $68,000 as altcoins lead modest bounce
Specialized AI detects 92% of real-world DeFi exploits
U.S. Supreme Court's decision on Trump's tariffs may not rock crypto — yet
